author: sarowe
msg: Maven configuration: Added Guava dependency to the Solr clustering contrib POM; previously the clustering contrib depended upon Guava transitively through its carrot2-core dependency, but the clustering contrib directly uses Guava's classes.

author: struberg
msg: WAGON-335 use different ports for the test server fixtures for each wagon module
This prevents us from getting 'Address already in use' Exceptions when building

author: minfrin
msg: mod_data: Introduce a filter to support RFC2397 data URLs.

author: olamy
msg: fix some unit tests setup in archiva-webdav
